## Usage

```r
library(blockr)
library(blockr.extra)

options(BLOCKR_DEV = TRUE)
pkgload::load_all(".")

stack <- new_stack(data_block, summarize_expr_block);
serve_stack(stack)

stack <- new_stack(data_block, filter_expr_block)
serve_stack(stack)

# see admiral vingette for how to use admiral_dpc_block
stack <- new_stack(data_block, mutate_block, admiral_dpc_block)
serve_stack(stack)

```

## Installation

You can install the development version of blockr.extra from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("blockr-org/blockr.extra")
```
